name: The Adventures of Zym in the Dimensions of Reality
name_original: The Adventures of Zym in the Dimensions of Reality
description:
My very alpha entry to the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

You are a robot who can open rifts and travel to different dimensions of reality.

Press G / X or SHIFT.

Oh and there are bugs, lol.

WASD = Movement, SPACE = Jump, CTRL/MOUSE1 = Shoot
